summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Telegram Bot Manager application. All 30 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI tested successfully with Russian interface. Key features tested: auth (register/login), accounts with price categories (<300$, 300-500$, 500$+), campaigns with account category selection, templates, analytics.

issues: Console warnings about chart dimensions (width/height -1) - charts render correctly but warnings appear during initial load
Missing aria-describedby for DialogContent - accessibility warning, not affecting functionality

critical_code_review_comments: Campaign creation with account_categories selection working
MOCKED: Telegram integration is simulated - messages are not actually sent

test_credentials.note: Each test creates unique users with uuid-based emails

seed_data_creation: Tests create their own test data with TEST_ prefix or unique UUIDs
context_for_next_testing_agent: All backend APIs tested with pytest. Frontend UI tested with Playwright. Key features: 1) Accounts have value_usdt field and price_category (low <300$, medium 300-500$, high 500$+), 2) Campaigns can select account_categories for targeting, 3) Telegram integration is MOCKED - no real messages sent. Test file at /app/tests/test_telegram_bot_manager.py covers all endpoints.

mocked_integrations.telegram_sending: MOCKED - Campaign execution simulates message sending with 90% delivery rate
mocked_integrations.telegram_responses: MOCKED - Responses are randomly generated (5-15% response rate)

auth.register: PASS - Creates user with JWT token

accounts.create_with_value_usdt: PASS - Creates account with price category

analytics.get_analytics: PASS - Returns all stats and daily_stats
